attributes.action: Call for the release of the complete documents containing information about Ricky Tomlinson and any of the Shrewsbury Pickets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The documents that were recently released about Ricky Tomlinson and the Shrewsbury Pickets were incomplete. Sections had been removed from the Political papers. We wish to know what was in the missing sections. 
Ricky Tomlinson is not considered a threat to National Security so there are no reason why these papers cannot be released.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
